A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Not as good as force awakens or rouge one but miles ahead of the prequels. This is a good movie i will see multiple times.  The ending was emotionally satisfying and i think in time people will view this installment the same way some view Empire. Like empire i wouldnt recommend it if someone is only going to watch only one star wars movie \, but in the context of force awakens and episode ix i think it will be beloved by all SW fans.
